name: Playlist Recording System
tagline: PRS Recording for Radio & TV Stations.
body:
### Playlist Recording System
The Playlist Recording System is a free tool to allow presenters to record music that they play on a radio/tv show.

It is simple to use and install and can also post the latest entry to a .txt file which can be read for your system to show the track to your users on your website.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
